name: Keep the marriage 'alive'
description:
Ludom Dare 46 entry, 

Keep the marriage alive is a game where the protagonists are a couple that have been married for years.

In their everyday live, many things can happen that will make loose thier temper - your objective is to "save" their marriage!

Key Icons=need to play using specific keys. 

Mouse Icon=need to play using your mouse.

Touch Icon= need to click and drag away from the screen something.

X icon=do not do anything. 

The Team:

Lead programmer: Marco Minganna -https://www.marcominganna.com

Lead Artist: Lucia Paganini-https://lucisaurus.com

Sound Engineer: Pietro Quaranta-https://itch.io/profile/iosonopie

All the game asset are done by the team. Used Unity Engine.
